text: @MikeBloomberg @Lawrence South Korea diagnosed its first case of COVID-19 the same day we did. Using techniques we developed, they held the deaths to 281 as of today. If America, with 6-1/2 times the population, had done as well, we would have only 1,827 deaths today rather than 123,000. Thank you DJT
